title: 21st Century Fox 's revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows the revenues of Fox from 2011 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Fox generated a global Revenue of approximately 30.4 billion U.S. dollars .
gold: Mass media corporation 21st Century Fox generated 30.4 billion U.S. dollars in revenue in the fiscal year 2018 , up from 28.5 billion U.S. dollars in the previous year.
The company made over half of its revenue in cable network programming in 2018 and a further 8.75 billion U.S. dollars was derived from its filmed entertainment segment.
The acquisition of 21st Century Fox by Disney 21st Century Fox consisted of News Corporations 's former TV and film divisions after the split from the News Corp. in June 2013 .
